Her family owns the largest diaper company in America, and because of that, her family decided not to toilet train her, she doesn't mind, neither does everyone, since she is an open Diaper wearer, in fact no one gives her problems if she walks around anywhere in just a shirt and diaper.

"Of course," said Pacifica.

Pacifica pushes a button and then a butler comes in with a new diaper.

"The usual Madam?" The Butler asked.

"Yes Watson," said Pacifica.

Watson starts removing the onesie and then the diaper. After the change, Watson places a purple tanktop on her.

"Would you like a skirt to wear madam?" Watson asked.

"No thank you," said Pacifica.

Watson leaves the room.

"What should I do today?" Pacifica asked herself.

Kimi Finster and her friends Lil DeVille, Susie Charmichael, and Angelica Pickles, were having a sleepover. Susie was heading out of town for the summer the next week to attend a music camp, so they wanted to have one last bash before being apart the whole summer. Things were going terrifically, until Angelica suggested they play a game of truth or dare. Kimi was the first girl up to pat, and Angelica produced adult sized diapers, a bib, and a baby bonnet from under her bed. She dared Kimi to put the babyish outfit on. "You planned this all along didn't you Angelica?!" Susie accused, to which Angelica taunted "Doesn't matter if I did or didn't, Kimi has to do it!", and she was right. Kimi had to follow the rules and put on the outfit.

She went to the bathroom and got dolled up. She stepped back out and even Lil and Susie couldn't help but laugh at her. And Angelica was full on cackling. 112322221.content: How does Laura get diapered?
112322221.title: X-23/Laura Kinney

choices: A female team of X-Men searching for her.
1123222211.content: Laura awoke with a start, opening her eyes she remembered her surroundings, since her last encounter with Weapon X three years ago she has been hiding out in the Canadian wilderness, her current hideout is a cave located near the top of a mountain in a pine tree forest, she had furnished it with items she had stolen from nearby towns and cities. She mostly survived off of water from the stream nearby and the animals she hunted, Hydra had taught her how to survive alone from a young age, so it was little challenge to someone of her capabilities, she had to admit it was lonely though. That wasn’t important right now though, she had been woken up for a reason. She strained her ears, her enhanced senses picked up several people walking. This immediately caused her to leaped out of her stolen bed into action, she walked outside and strained her eyes in the direction of the sound, her gaze piercing through the forest, what did she see?
1123222211.title: Punishment from the X-Men

11232222111.content: Laura looks at a team of female mutants, they seem to be searching for something, most likely her, she uses her photographic memory to remember the files she saw at S.H.I.E.L.D, she identifies the mutants as Jean Grey, Emma Frost, Rogue, Kitty Pryde, Domino, Pyslocke, Jubilee and Storm, while she had singlehandedly taken out nearly every X-Men in the past she had caught them by surprise and had the help of her tasers to do so, she may be able to put up a fight but she would most likely lose this encounter, what will she do?
11232222111.title: A female team of X-Men searching for her.

choices: No, the team finds her before she can escape.
Yes, she continues to run away.
112322221111.content: She began to creep away from her hiding spot, methodically darting between the trees to escape her enemies, unfortunately this doesn’t work out, seemingly against all odds three of the trees in front of her began to tip and fall out of nowhere Laura gasped and began to dive out of the way dodging the falling trees. However this wasn’t the end, the rumble and sound of the trees falling would no doubt alert her pursuers, and the trees falling started a chain reaction, more trees began to tip and the mountainside began to collapse, not even someone as agile and quick as her would be able to escape. Just as it seemed freedom was within her grasp, a final tree collapsed, trapping one of her legs. She let out a gasp in surprise as her leg gets stuck beneath the massive obstacle, before letting out a sigh, this was no doubt the work of Domino. She could cut through it with her claws, but the tree is incredibly large, will she escape before the X-Men find her?
112322221111.title: Attempt to escape.

1123222211111.content: The team ran towards the sound of what felt like a small earthquake, initially, nothing was found, but straining her ears Rogue heard the sound of wood continually being slashed, she called to the others to come to her location as she began to identify where the sound was coming from, the first thing she noticed about X-23 was that in three years she had changed a lot, she had visibly aged, her breast were noticeably larger, and her waste was slightly larger, befitting her 16 year old self, her chin and face was sharper, and it seemed as though she had dyed her hair, it was still brown, but the tips of her straightened hair were now black. She still wore a black leather coat, but rather than a shirt she now wore an equally dark crop top and leather pants, it clung tightly to her body but she doubted X-23 cared, preferring the freedom of movement. The one thing that hadn’t changed was her size, she was still incredibly small even for her age, she would be lucky to reach 5 feet and she was incredibly skinny, possibly malnourished, though her soft skin contained packed abs beneath it. The team surrounded her as she glared at them. What will the team do?
1123222211111.title: No, the team finds her before she can escape.

choices: She is weakened, but continues to fight.
11232222111111.content: Emma frost approached the young mutant, smirking, her mental defences were strong, even more so than Logan’s, no doubt Hydra didn’t want her giving up any of their secrets but not even she could face her, Jean Grey, and Betsy Braddock alone, “We’re bringing you in X-23, though we may have a little fun with you first, Jean, Braddock, let’s get to work” the three women approached the girl closing their eyes and preparing to knock her out, what they didn’t expect was that X-23 had already freed herself, and was waiting for the right moment for an ambush, suddenly, she jumped out from under the tree drop kicking Emma straight into Rogue, taking her out of the fight instantly she quickly landed, rolled, and kicked Jean in the stomach, knocking her back and causing her to trip over a log and fall over. She narrowly avoided a swing from Psylocke’s blade, jumping, flipping and kicking Jubilee in the face, she had yet to use her claws, even if they were attacking her, she did not wish to harm the X-Men, (X-Women?) as she knew now they we’re good people, she didn’t expect Jubilee to recover so quickly however, before she can react Jubilee shot a firework straight into her eyes, temporarily blinding her, causing her to stumble backwards, straight into Pyslocke, who jumps and kicks her in the back once again causing her to stumble straight into Domino, who trips her, once again before she can react, Rogue has both hands placed on her forehead “That’s it honey, you just go right to sleep.” What happens next?
11232222111111.title: Knock her out.

choices: Removed her continence and physical strength.
Removed her continence and regressed her mind.
112322221111111.content:
Once again, Laura awakes with a start, she finds herself chained up in a flight cabin, most likely that of The Blackbird, she angrily pulls at the chains, hoping to free herself. Domino smirks “Good luck with that kid, it’s pure adamantium, not even your claws can cut through that” Laura would normally break her hands to free herself from the chains, knowing they would heal, but it seems the X-Men planned for that, her hands are covered with thick mittens, preventing her from getting enough of a grip to break anything, to her dismay they are incredibly childish, pink with white frills. “What are you going to do to me!” She shouted, announcing to the rest of the team she had woken up. “Well X-23, like Ms. Frost said, we are bringing you back to the X-Men, but since it’s a long trip, we’re gonna have some fun first!” Shadowcat announced from the pilot’s seat. “Don’t call me that.” She growls, “What?” Is the only response she gets.”Don’t call me X-23, my name is Laura... Laura Kinney”

“Well, I suppose that is some progress, realising your name is not X-23, maybe we’ll let you back into society sooner than anticipated” Jean responds. “But not yet, Logan requested to speak to you first and you need to spend a few years back at the institute living a normal life, living in the wilderness is hardly good for your social skills.” Laura frowned, “If you bring me back to your institution I will simply escape”. Emma Frost approached her, roughly grabbing her chin, tilting her head to look her in the eyes, Laura flinched are the contact, seeming uncomfortable. “Oh, we know, Logan has the naive belief that you’ll want to stay with him, but we know better, that’s why we’re going to make it so you can’t, Jean, Betsy, let’s actually get to work this time” Laura watched the three women approach her once more. “Wha-“ but before she could finish, a huge weight pressured her mind, causing her to groan. She felt her strength drain. What did the psychics do to her?
112322221111111.title: She passes out.

choices: White and pink frilly dress, bonnet, and tights, matching her mittens.
1123222211111111.content: Laura immediately felt weaker, more vulnerable, to her surprise though, Emma removed the chains from her legs and arms, sending her tumbling down onto the cabin floor, she immediately tried to get up, ready to attack her captors, but no matter how hard she tried, she couldn’t get off of her hands and knees, shocked she looked up to the grinning psychics, “What did you do to me?!” She tried to shout, but her voice was as weak as her body, the sentence came out mumbled and quiet. “Well baby” Psylocke said, looking down at her, “Since you’ve never had a proper childhood, we decided to provide one for you, you’re a baby, and you have the strength of one too” Laura was stunned silent by that, unable to respond to what they had done to her. Jubilee jumped up in excitement and picked Laura up with ease that surprised her, she was embarrassed by how small she was already, but she didn’t realise she was that light. “Awwww, we’re going to have so much fun with you! First things first, babies don’t wear Leather jackets and crop tops, let’s get you into something more appropriate! She pressed a button on the side of the cabin, the wall opened up, revealing a wardrobe, how will Jubilee dress Laura?

Why does mystery twin Dipper
Wear a puffy absorbent Diaper

Hey that rhymed
1213111.title: Dipper

12131111.content:
Dipper is on the outside, a typical tween, but on the inside however, he has both bladder and bowel incontinence. Due to that, he wears diapers, but he really isn't embarrassed about it, since his family, like his twin sister Mabel, help him out all the time managing it. Even right now since he and his sister are staying in Gravity Falls, Oregon, for the summer, with their great uncle Stan, who helps dipper out and never makes fun of him, neither do his employees Soos and Wendy.

Right now Dipper is waking up to the same feeling he wakes up to since the day he was born, a full diaper.

Dipper walks downstairs.

"Grunkle Stan I need a change," said Dipper.

"I'm a little busy, let soos or wendy change you," said Grunkle Stan.

Who changes him?
12131111.title: Medical (Incontinent)

121311112.content:
Dipper then walks towards Wendy. Who smelled him coming from a mile away.

"Let me guess, Stan was busy?" Wendy asked.

"Yep," said Dipper.

"Figured as much," said Wendy.

Wendy picks him up and takes him to the changing table in his room.

"Thanks for changing me Wendy," said Dipper.

"No Problem," said Wendy, "Us diapered kind stick together no matter what."

Confused? Wendy has never been toilet trained, her father thinks using the toilet cuts time into being a lumberjack, so none of the Corduroy's never sat on a toilet once in their lives. She doesn't mind because she thinks its easier to poop yourself than go to a room, pull your pants down and do your business on a chair with a hole.

First Wendy removes the soiled diaper, then grabs a wet wipe and cleans off every piece of mess from him.

"You don't find it weird that you're looking at my crotch," said Dipper.

"I have 3 brothers, so I'm used to it," said Wendy, "But it's less awkward, because we aren't related."

"Okay," said Dipper,

Wendy tapes a new diaper onto Dipper.

"Thanks Wendy," said Dipper.

"No problem dude," said Wendy.

Later:

The Mystery Shack when Wendy tapped Dipper on the shoulder.

"You wanna stay over at my house tonight, my dad and brothers are out of town and I got nothing to do," said Wendy.

Does Dipper Go for it?
121311112.title: Wendy

1213111121.content:
"Okay," said Dipper.

"Really?" Wendy asked.

"Yeah, Mabel's having a sleepover here and I rather get out before her friends get here, they go nuts," said Dipper.

122211.content:
The lab was a large room full of amazing and cold, dark, machines. Each one beeped and wooed, and some let off steam. Large pipes ran everything along the walls, and a few on the floor. 122311.title: Tony Ideas

choices: He wakes up sucking his thumb
1223111.content:
Tony was the youngest child out of the four siblings, and he had very mixed feelings about. He was always being treated like the 'baby brother' even though Marc and Megan where only a year older than him, he was the smallest and physically weakest and most of the time he was undermined by the others while out on missions. On the other hand he seemed to get away with a lot more things, often being able to pan the blame on to Marc, and was given by far the most attention in the family, he received the most gifts for Christmas and birthdays and could manipulate his parents easier than the others could, so it had it's ups and downs. Toby leapt from the catwalk he was standing on to avoid a beam of green light, distracting him from his thoughts.
"What do you think that ray thing does?" Megan asked as she landed next to Tony.
"I'm not sure, but I really don't want to find out," Marc replied, landing opposite to opponent with Lee.
"We need a way to get that ray-gun off of him," Lee whispered over to Marc.
"I'm thinking," Marc replied, he tapped on his intercom. "I need a distraction."
"Leave that to us," Megan replied, she grabbed a loose metal rod and threw it at the foe, he jumped out of the way and started shooting at her, she flipped back, dodging the rays. While the man was distracted Lee and Marc jumped up onto several beams over head, Marc grabbed a rusted piece of metal before preparing to leap. Once again, everyone had completely forgotten about Tony and he was left out of the plan. It was getting hard especially lately, it seemed that everything Tony did only seemed to hinder the others. When the man was in position Marc pounced on him, jamming the rusted metal into the high-tech ray-gun.
"No! You're ruining everything!" The man shouted, Lee also attacked and the two boys struggled against the man, during the struggle a stray shot from the gun shot towards Megan, who was otherwise occupied.
"Megan, Watch out!" Tony shouted before jumping towards her, he pushed the girl out of the road and shouted as he was zapped by the ray.
"TONY!" Upon hearing his bother's scream Lee seemed to be given a boost of strength as he single handedly knocked the man to the ground, unconscious. Marc was the first to run to Tony's side, he rolled the boy over and checked for any damages, there didn't seem to be any, the ray only seemed to knock the boy out.

"So? What was that ray supposed to do?" Lee asked impatiently.
"Don't worry yourself," Jerry calmed him, "Tony is perfectly fine, it appears whatever the ray was supposed to do it didn't."
"It must have stopped working when I jabbed it with that piece of metal," Marc reasoned.
"That does appear to be the case," Jerry confirmed, "it's a good thing you did, who knows what could have happened to Tony if it worked." Megan looked down at the ground.
"It was all my fault," she informed, "I should have been paying attention."
"It's fine, after all Tony's safe," Marc reassured her, "can we see him?"
"Be my guest," Jerry replied. The trio walked into the infirmary room where Tony was siting on the bed.
"You feeling ok bud?" Marc asked, taking a seat next to Tony.
"I feel kind of funny," Tony replied, he pointed to his stomach, "like around here." The trio laughed as Tony grinned widely.
"That's no surprise, it's probably been a whole two hours since you ate," Lee replied.
"Wow, how is he still alive?" Megan asked, mocking a shocked expression.
"Come on Garbage Truck, let's get home," Marc helped Tony up and the four retuned to the house. The rest of the evening was eventless, they did their own things, before having dinner and watching TV until it was time to go to bed. Tony climbed up onto the top bunk as he always did with Marc sleeping in the bottom bunk. Marc turned the light off and fell asleep almost instantly but of course Toby decided to play a few more games on his phone before his sleepiness got the better of him.
1223111.title: Diaper Ray

choices: Make a run for the corridoor
No one notices he messed himself
Marc notices that Tony is messy
12231111.content:
Toby rolled over in his bed as he woke up, groggily he sat up and rubbed his eyes, something felt off, there was a weird, moist feeling around him, he looked down to see a wet patch around his crotch, he yelped upon seeing that he had wet the bed, no way! he was a big kid, he didn't wet the bed. He quickly looked under the bed and saw Marc soundly asleep. Tony sighed as he slowly got out of bed, at first he stripped down and changed into his usual clothes, next he ripped the sheets off of his bed and snuck down the hallway, making sure not to wake anyone in the house. He quickly stuffed his sheets in the washing to rinse them, while that was happening he changed the sheets on his own bed. He moved to the washing room and put the wet sheets in the dryer before drying them, after they were dry he carefully folded them and placed them in his draw, he had never been so glad to have to do his own washing until now.
"What are you doing?" Tony jumped out of his skin, he quickly turned around to see Marc sitting on his bed, looking at his younger brother.
"I'm, making sure all my bed sheets are in order," Tony lied. Marc raised an eyebrow.
"In order for what?" Marc asked, Tony had to think quickly.
"For...uh...the next time I change them," Tony explained, "I've ordered them from favourite to least favourite."
"You're weird," Marc rolled his eyes as he walked to his own drawer and pulled out some clothes, after getting changed he walked towards the bed and tossed his pyjamas on his bed, he paused and looked at Tony's bed. "You didn't have those bedsheets yesterday." Tony could feel himself sweating, of course Marc noticed, he's so detailed orientated he could probably tell if the beach was missing a single grain of sand.
"What do you mean?" Tony asked, opting to go the ignorant, naive route.
"You had the blue bedsheet last night, this is the green one," Marc elaborated.
"I think you might need glasses," Tony replied.

The day was a fairly boring one, there was no missions to go on, no school and since their parents were out for the next few weeks they had no one with them at the house, since Jerry agreed to pretend to be a baby-sitter while their parents were there and leave when they were alone. The four siblings kept to themselves for the most part except for Marc, who looked at Tony suspiciously for the whole day. He knew something was very off, Tony had blue bedsheets when he went to sleep, Marc knew that, and Tony was never up before him when they didn't have school. Tony however was thinking all day about how he had wet the bed, he wasn't sure when the last time he wet the bed was, he knew he was late to develop his potty-training skill but he certainly didn't wet the bed, he hadn't in years. What he hadn't noticed, from being so focused on the morning's incident was that he was going to the toilet an unusually frequent amount of times, once an hour or more.
"Good night Tony," Marc announced as he turned the light out in their room.
"Good night Marc," Tony replied, "and remember, my bedsheet is GREEN." Marc rolled his eyes as he fell asleep.

To his horror, when Tony woke up the next morning he was once again in a wet bed. He quickly repeated the routine he had started the day before, this time making sure to use the same colour bedsheet and blanket so that Marc wouldn't notice, he may have dodged the bullet once but he was certain he couldn't a second time. That only seemed to be the beginning as well, the next few days started the same way, Tony would wake up in a wet bed and have to quickly wash his sheets before everyone else got up. It was starting to worry him, he wouldn't dare tell anyone but he wasn't sure what was wrong with him.
"So that is your mission," Jerry informed.
"That's all you have for us?" Lee asked, "reconnaissance?"
"Unfortunately there have been no devastating crimes or natural disasters of late," Jerry replied sarcastically.
"It's good to have a quiet mission of once," Megan admitted.
"I agree," Marc added, "no life-threatening disaster to worry about."
"I have prepared your jet," Jerry informed. In no time the team was at the side of an old, abandoned warehouse.
"So what are we supposed to be looking for?" Tony asked as he followed his siblings.
"Didn't you listen to Jerry?" Megan asked.
"Apparently this warehouse is used for weapon transactions, it could possibly be where the man found that ray-gun thing," Marc informed.
"Oh, ok," Tony replied. Lee opened the window and the four kids climbed in, they cautiously walked through the warehouse. Tony suddenly feels a strong pressure in his bowels, he tried to focus but the pressure only seemed to be building, he couldn't believe it, he was going to shit himself, he couldn't stop it. He looked for somewhere he could hide, there was one corridor he could run down, but what would he do once he actually went. Had to think fast cause his time was running out.
12231111.title: All Downhill

122311113.content:
Tony whimpered, the brown mush escaping into the seat of his suit, creating a large bulge. He didn't want to keep walking, it felt weird, but he didn't want to pull any focus to himself, no one seemed to had noticed, but he wasn't sure how long that would last, the smell would eventually catch up with them.
"I think we'll be able to gather more information if we split up," Marc informed, turning to the group.
"Good idea, we can search more ground that way," Megan agreed.
"Ok, I'll go with Tony," Marc offered, "Lee and Megan, you should continue down this way, there was a corridor leading to another part of the warehouse Tony and I can check out."
"Keep safe," Lee replied, before Tony had time to object he was grabbed by the arm and dragged off by Marc, the boy turned the corner before looking Tony dead in the eye.
"What the hell was that?" Marc asked, tears formed in Tony's eyes. "Tony, if you needed to go to the toilet you just needed to say so, there was no need to hold it in so long you had to shit in your suit."
"I couldn't help it," Tony cried, "I didn't even feel the need to go before it was too late." Marc's expression seemed to lighten, he looked around the corner where Lee and Megan were far from sight.
"Look, I don't think the others noticed so we can keep this between us," Marc said, to which Tony smiled, he was afraid Marc would make fun of him, he was actually being really helpful. "But what's up with you lately, first the bed-wetting now this."
"You know about my bed-wetting?" Tony asked, frowning. Marc replied with a cheeky smirk.
"Now I do," Tony was horrified, he just told his brother he wet the bed, this was awful, how could he fall for the oldest trick in the book. "I had my suspicions that you were wetting the bed, you should have told us, me at least."
"But, you would make fun of me," Tony reasoned tears still filling his eyes.
"Am I making fun of you now?" Marc asked, Tony shook his head, "that's because I care about you Tony and if you have a problem you should tell me so I can help you." he turned the corner again to make sure Megan and Lee were well out of sight. "Let's get back to the jet, I'll be able to clean you and we can continue the mission."

Marc picked Tony up and carried him over to the jet so that Tony didn't have to walk and spread the mess more, once they were in the jet Marc order Tony to undo the top half of his suit while went into the back of the jet. Marc replied with a hose and towel.
"Sorry pal but this is the only way I can clean you for now," Marc apologised. he peeled away Tony's pants and with the hose gently washed away all the mess, he made sure to clean the boy thoroughly before grabbing the towel and drying all up the boy's legs and privates. When he was done he handed Tony his spare suit to get changed.
"Thank you Marc," Tony replied after he was dressed, still sobbing lightly from the mortifying experience, Marc hugged the boy tightly, rubbing his head soothingly.
"There's no need to cry Tony, you're ok now," Marc reassured his brother. After Tony had fully calmed down they returned to the warehouse. Unfortunately the warehouse turned out to be a dud and they didn't manage to get any clues. Without anything to go on they were dismissed and retuned home. The next morning Tony woke up once again to a wet bed, he sighed and climbed down.
"You wet the bed?" Marc asked, still partially asleep.
"Y-Yes," Tony hesitated before answering, he was about to cry before he saw Marc get up and rip off Tony's sheets for him.
"I'll get these clean in case any one is awake, you put new sheets on your bed," Marc ordered before heading out. As he walked down the hall he heard footsteps heading towards him.
"What's that smell?" Lee asked, completely disgusted.
"I accidentally wet the bed last night," Marc informed, he was far too sleepy to care about what Lee would think, not that it mattered anyway, Lee was the last of the four children to stop wetting the bed at night, however on he knew that out of Lee's siblings.
"Seriously? Aren't you a bit old to be wetting the bed?" Lee asked.
"It was an accident," Marc defended.
"Yeah, at twelve-years-old, you should probably start growing up," Lee responded. Marc rolled his eyes, Lee was insufferable in the morning, that was the main reason Marc wanted to be the one to wash Tony's sheets, Tony looked up to Lee like he's a god, if Lee said that to him Tony would be heartbroken, Marc on the other hand could handle his insults. After cleaning Tony's sheets Marc returned them and packed them away, he got dressed himself before meeting his siblings for breakfast.

"Hey Megan, guess who's a little bed-wetter here," Lee announced, Tony's heart sank, how did he find out? did Marc rat him out? Now he was going to be teased by all his siblings. "Marc here was washing the sheets he peed all over, just like a baby." Tony didn't understand, did he just say Marc peed all over them? Tony looked over to Marc who winked at him.
"So, mr 'brains of the family' is nothing more than a bed-wetter?" Megan asked, "I always knew you were the least mature twin." Tony couldn't believe it, Marc had taken the fall for him, Marc had told the others he was the bed-wetter and now he was being teased because of it. After breakfast Marc entered the room to grab his phone and was about to leave before bumping into Tony, Marc was instantly alert when he saw the tears forming in Tony's eyes.
"Tony, what's wron..." Tony tightly hugged Marc, not wanting to ever let go.
"I'm sorry," he cried, "they're teasing you because of me." Marc smiled and hugged Tony back. There was nothing for Tony to worry about, Marc didn't care about the insults, he knew Lee was only saying those things because he wasn't full awake yet and once he was he wouldn't ever dream of saying things like that, and as for Megan, she was his twin, it was her job to tease him, but he knew she didn't think any less of him even if he did wet the bed.
"It's ok buddy," Marc rubbed the boy's hair. "How about we go do something today, just the two of us?" Marc suggested, Tony looked up at him smiling.
122311113.title: Big Brother's There For You

1223111131.content:
"Ice-Cream sounds awesome!" Marc smiled, he wrote a note and left it on the table for the others to find before heading out with Tony. Marc was happy to be able to have a day out with Tony, not only would it help to talk about Tony's problem and ways to deal with it but Marc felt like he didn't spend enough time with his little bother, well, besides when they were on deadly missions, he spent far much more time with Megan and Lee and he was afraid Tony would start feeling neglected considering how much the boy loved the company of others.
"So where should we go?" Tony asked, "there's the ice-cream truck at the park, or we could go to the ice-creamery, or even Siber Smoothies." Toby was super excited, at first he was afraid that Marc might tell the others and make fun of him but instead he took all the teasing for himself, Marc had always been Tony's favourite brother, being the closest in age and everything, but now he was even happier because he truely felt like he could trust Marc, being out with him was going to be super fun, Marc may be a geek and be into geeky things but he definitely knew how to have fun, and he knew everyone well enough to know exactly what they'd find fun.
"Well I'm the one treating you so you pick," Marc replied, "I'm not too fussy on ice-cream anyway."
"Ok then," Tony concentrated for a moment, weighing his options. "Let's go to the ice-creamery!"
"The expensive one, why am I not surprised," Marc rolled his eyes with a smile on his face, that was the one he had intended to go to in the first place anyway. The duo entered a courtyard area with many food shops surrounding it, Marc entered the ice-creamery with Tony close behind, the ice-creamery had about every flavour of ice-cream under the sun, there was cookies and cream, or Mars bar, even flavours like Chai Latte and Mocha.
"Hello, what would you like today?" the clerk asked as Marc walked towards the counter.
"Oh, can I have Maltesers and White Chocolate?" Tony asked.
"I'll take two three scoop ice-creams please, in cones," Marc ordered, Tony's face lit up like a Christmas tree.
"In that case I'll take Maltesers, White Chocolate and Cookies and Cream!" Tony announced.
"And I'll take Banana, Salted Caramel and, yeah White Chocolate, why not," Marc added, the clerk got to work and handed the boys their ice-creams.
"That'll be $22.80," the clerk informed.
"Well there goes two weeks worth of work," Marc mumbled as he handed over the money.

"Thanks big bro!" Tony cheered, "this tastes really good!"
"I'm glad you like it," Marc smiled. Marc was struggling against himself, he was debating wether he should discuss Tony's issue now or wait until later, after all, he wouldn't want to upset the boy, especially when he was enjoying himself so much. Eventually Marc opted to wait until later and instead asked Tony about the going ons at the drama club he spent a lot of time at. Marc was interested to hear about the clubs next musical, Dance Of The Vampire. Marc had just finished up his ice-cream cone by the time Tony had finished talking about the musical, the two boys stood up and were about to leave when the ground shook violently, they looked around and noticed a man with a strange machine strapped to his back.
"That guy must be causing the earthquakes," Tony reasoned, "we need to stop him."
"Agreed, but it may be hard to get close to him while he continues making tremors," Marc replied, "Maybe I could try to keep to the air and attack him that way..." Tony looked down sad, once again he was just going to be ignored completely, he supposed that his new bond with Marc still didn't change anything, Marc looked down at Tony while he was devising a plan and saw the sad expression on his brother's face, an instant guilty feeling struck him like a stab wound, he knew how much Tony hated being passed off as the insignificant baby brother. "You know what, I'm out of ideas, what do you think we should do Tony?" Tony looked up at his brother in shock, the older boy smiled down to his brother, a gesture Tony returned.
"I think we could use his power against him," Tony suggested, "make him shake himself into a hole."
"Ok, we'll need to lure him over some sort of chamber," Marc informed.
"The drain!" Tony exclaimed, pointing over to the side of the road.

"Nice clothes," Tony complimented, "I think my grandma has a set just like it!" The man growled and changed at them, the boy backed up slightly before Tony flinched.
"What's wrong?" Marc asked, concerned.
"Can't...really...go..." Tony muttered, fidgeting in his spot, he couldn't feel it before but he felt immense pressure and he knew it wouldn't be long until he had another accident. Tony was too focused on not having an accident that he wasn't focused on the man changing at them, Marc grabbed onto Tony and brought him to his hip before jumping back just as the man landed his fist down on the drain cover they were standing on, the ground gave way and he fell straight in, trapping himself. Marc landed on the ground with Tony in his arms.
"I'm sorry," was all the young boy managed to say before warm liquid poured down from his pants, wetting both him and Marc. As awful as it felt Marc didn't comment, he waited for Tony to be done and when he was he let the boy down, now they both looked like they had wet themselves.

"We should probably talk about what happened today," Marc informed as he sat in front of Tony, both now in fresh clothes, they luckily were able to make it back home without anyone taking notice to their pants and their siblings weren't around either, they were both in their rooms. Tony nodded slowly, he was so ashamed, not only did he piss himself, that he could probably handle, but he pissed ON Marc, Tony couldn't look his brother in the eyes, he was probably so disgusted by him. "Tony look at me, it's ok, you had an accident, it wasn't your fault."
"But...I peed on you," Tony started to cry.
"Come on Tony," Marc kneeled on the ground and tried looking up at the boy. "You had no control, it's fine I'm not holding it against you." There was a moment of silence before Tony hugged Marc again, this hug was different, this wasn't a hug for support or a hug out of fear of loosing him, this was a thanks, for everything Marc had already done, everything Marc went through without holding any of it against Tony.
"But what if next time it's worse, like a bigger mess?" Tony asked.
"That's what I want to talk about," Marc informed. He sat back up and faced Tony. "I have a feeling the ray that hit you was what is causing this, so I'll need to find a way to reverse the effects, until then it'll probably be better if we do something to help your accidents." Marc paused for a moment, "you really aren't going to like me but I think you should wear diapers." Tony's eyes widened.

Marc explained, "the others won't know, it'll be just between the two of us and I'll change you every time you have an accident." Tony remained quiet, Marc couldn't be serious, diapers were for babies, Tony wasn't a baby, he was eleven he wore undies, he didn't need diapers. But that was just it, he DID need diapers, as much as he didn't want to admit it he WAS crapping himself like a baby. Marc was nice to him this entire time, he helped him and took the fall for him, Tony had more than enough reasons to trust Marc to help him through needing to wear diapers. The least he could do was agree with Marc and let him help.
"Look, there are three types of diapers you could wear," Marc explained. "The first are real diapers, they're big and puffy but they can hold any mess you would have in them. You could also go for pull-ups, they're slightly thiner and easier to hide but they can't hold as much so you'd have to be change almost immediately. The last are Goodnights, these are pretty much undies with a bit more padding at the front and back, they could probably stop you wetting yourself but if you have a messy accident they'll be just as bad as undies. I'll let you choose what you want to wear."

Arnold was a smart kid, he was healthy and had a pretty good life, but fate apparently wasn't fine with that. It started not long after Arnold had turned nine, he woke up sleepily to a very odd feeling, he sat up and looked down on his bed, to his horror there was a large wet patch around his crotch area, desperate to make sure no-one figured out he rushed out to grab a towel and lay it on the bed, it was still dark so no one would be up for a few hours, meaning he was able to dry his bed before anyone noticed, even if it did leave a foul urine smell behind. That was only the start though, eventually his new found bedwetting became more frequent and he started noticing later and later, running the risk of him being found out. He didn't know what was wrong, he never wet the bed before, the last time he had an accident was probably when he was still in diapers, he had no idea what was happening to him. That morning he woke up once again to a wet bed, covered it with towel and changed into his clothes. Being the weekend he had planned to stay at the boarding house, he didn't want to go anywhere today, he felt lazy. After breakfast he was free to do as he wished, he first decided to watch some TV before going back to his room to see if the wet bed was dry, he sneaked into his room, making sure no one would follow him. To his relief it didn't seem like anyone had noticed his wet bed. He took the towels off and threw it away. After finishing he walked outside the boarding house and bumped into a familiar face.
"There you are," Gerald exclaimed as he spotted his round-headed friend.
"How are you Gerald?" Arnold greeted.
"I was looking for you, come on, I want to show you something," Gerald grabbed onto Arnold's arm and dragged him down the streets.
"Where are we going?" Arnold asked.
"You'll see," Gerald replied, Arnold was unsure about where his friend was taking him, his uneasy feeling increased as he felt an unusually strong pressure in his bowels. It was intense and felt like he had a brick weighing a tonne in him. How did he not realise he needed to go earlier, he was about to burst and he was still being dragged by Gerald.
"Can we stop for a moment," Arnold pleaded, he could NOT soil himself in front of Gerald, that would be the most embarrassing thing he could ever do.
"No way, trust me, you'll want to see this," Gerald replied, Arnold could feel the pressure increasing, he was going to go, he had to do something and quickly.

It was about 7 in the morning when young Arnold began to wake up, as he always did on a school day, and get ready for his day. He crawls out of bed, exposing a thick diaper, and begins to head downstairs for some breakfast. Now for most kids his age they would probably change their clothes to hide the fact that they still wore protection at night but then again Arnold didn't just wear them at night. You see he was never fully potty trained, mostly due to the fact that he was raised in a boarding house where everyone shared one bathroom, you can see how that would make potty training someone difficult.

Arnold really didn't seem to care if the tents of his grandparents' boardinghouse saw his diaper on full display, mostly cause at one point or another during his life most of them had changed his diapers, he would often go around wearing just a shirt and his diaper.......unless his friends were over. That was a whole different story.

You see while everyone in the boardinghouse, and his best friend Gerald, knew about his little issue no one else did. Hiding a secret like this did come with its challenges, namely trying to hide the bulk of the diaper and the smell of his "accidents", but he had gotten pretty good at hiding it. His Grandpa bought him special diapers that blocked the smell and Arnold wore a long undershirt to block the bulk. If he was gonna have any say in it no one was gonna find out about his diapers.

Almost everyone of them had gotten over that already..........except for the occasional tenant buying him a pack of diapers just in case he was running low but that wasn't the case when it came to Mrs Kokoshka. 1232111.content:
Spending all day skating, swimming, surfing, and basically having the time of your life daily, for an 11 year old is fantastic. When dad announced that the family was going to Vermont to see some other family, Otto and Reggie we're excited to try something new and to see the new place, but leaving behind their friends was going to be hard.

Arriving in Vermont, the kids were introduced to their Aunt and Uncle and their kids, 11 year old Leslie and 6 year old Timmy. The kids were excited to have some new kids to enjoy things with. The whole drive up the mountain, Leslie talked to them about snowboarding, skiing, and the new bobsled just put in. The kids couldn't wait to get to the cabin to get started.

"Alright, Otto and Timmy, you two will be in this room right here," Otto's uncle told them as they got to the cabin. Looking in the room, there was bunk beds, a tv, and two brand new snowboards. "Thought you might need one since you've never been before." Otto and Timmy were so excited and started looking at the two snowboards while they showed the girls to their room.

A few minutes later, Otto's dad and Timmy's mom came walking into the room and closed the door behind them. Otto we want to talk to you about something before things get going. Timmy turned bright red at this comment and looked directly at the floor. "Timmy has a little issue with wetting the bed," his mom explained setting down a small suitcase on the floor that Otto hadn't noticed earlier. "As a result, to ensure there are no problems, he will be wearing these at night and when needed during the day." Opening the suitcase, Otto saw what had to have been 100 diapers. "We keep them in here at home so this was easy to take, he won't go through all these on the trip."

Otto looked in wonder, not recalling what it had been like to wear diapers. Just as he was looking, Timmy's mom pulled his pants down to reveal a diaper they must have had him wear due to the long drive. Although he was wet, she put him in underwear and the kids went off to explore around the cabin with the girls the rest of the afternoon.

That night, the kids were getting ready for bed when Timmy's mom came in right before lights out. She quickly put a diaper on Timmy and reminded him that if he needed to go potty, just to wake her up and she'll help him out. Otto looked on, seeing his 6 year old cousin getting put in a diaper. Otto began to wonder how many older kids wear diapers.

He stayed up for a while and once he confirmed that Timmy had fallen asleep, he snuck out of bed to investigate the diaper more closely. The first thing he noticed was that these were definitely big enough for older kids. "They wouldn't make diapers this size of kids didn't need them," he thought to himself. He opened the diaper and felt the inside and thought that it felt nice, but thought it was silly. Then a thought occurred to him, what if I put one in my underwear to see how it feels.

This continued every night for the week. Otto slowly started being more brave with it and by the end of the week he was actually strapping one to himself after Timmy went to sleep. The night before they were scheduled to leave, everyone was packing their bags. Otto decided to take some of the diapers and pack them at the bottom of his bag. There were still a ton of diapers, so he put 15 in his bag before zipping it up.

The next morning, his dad came in to check everything out. To Otto's horror, he started to unzip the bag.

Normally, his dad locked the door behind him, ensuring that Reggie didn't come into the room during a diaper change. Today on the other hand, dad must have been preoccupied because in the middle of a change in came Reggie looking for dad. She let out a snicker, seeing her brother lying there with a diaper around his waist, but in the end, she understood the need for secrecy.

Later, they decided to go surfing with their friends, something they had done many times before. As usual, dad took off his regular diaper and handed him a swim diaper to change into. He quickly changed, making sure that the diaper was completely concealed below his shorts before setting out to hang with their friends.

As usual, he and his best friend, Twister, kept trying to one up each other with a bigger wave. In the end, Otto caught a massive wave and was riding it well, but as the wave was breaking, Otto misjudged and wiped out causing him to...

info.brief_description: What would happen to our favorite cartoons if a character wore diapers?
info.description:
What would happen to your favorite cartoons if one of their characters wore diapers? Well that's what this story, and you guys and gals are gonna decide. Choose why, why are they wearing diapers. Choose how other characters will react.

Rules:

1.Only the specified character can be diapered.

2.Stick to their gender, no changing gender in anyway.

3.No sex, unless its a adult toon character.

4.Have fun.
